title: 20: S5E20 – "Skin Deep" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Seth Paul, N.M. Brown, James Colton, and Simon Simonian, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about nightmarish nature, costly curses, mysterious maulings, and hunters of humans. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
